oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hey Y'All BASKETBALL is Coming!
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Basketball; Announcements; Gymnasiums
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
This spirit duplicated (ditto) flyer announced fall try-outs and practice for the coming basketball season at Christian Brothers College.
Team coaches were: Mr. Hofer (Varsity); Brother Levian Thomas (Junior College); Brother Timothy (Freshmen); Brother Terence ("B" team); Brother Roger (Faculty). Brother Ambrose was director of all gym activities
